The Program

School of Education, 3rd Floor

  • Welcome
    9:00AM
  • Opening Remarks
    Kelly Baker Josephs
    9:15AM
  • Intellectual Histories, Archival Engagements
    Carole Boyce Davies, V. Emma Kioko, Jeanne Jégousso, Emily O’Dell, Sylvia Fernández, Annette Zapata, Gary Wilder
    9:30AM-10:45AM

    Tao Leigh Goffe, Catherine Benoît, Upasana Bhattacharjee
    11AM-12:15PM

    Isis Semaj-Hall, Robin Brooks, Benjamin Branch, Tzarina T. Prater
    1:45-3PM

    Laurie Taylor, Leah Rosenberg, Bryan Wagner, Amalia S. Levi, Roopika Risam
    3:15-4:45PM

    Elizabeth Maddock Dillon, Alanna Prince
    4:45-6:30PM

School of Education, 3rd Floor
